name: ai-testcase-analyzer
description: Playwright + TypeScript test automation framework with AI failure analysis and Slack notifications.

scripts.run:trace: npm run playwright:install && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.demo: cross-env NODE_ENV=demo dotenv -e .env.demo -- npm run run:trace && cross-env NODE_ENV=demo npm run report:ai
scripts.prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod dotenv -e .env.prod -- npm run run:trace && cross-env NODE_ENV=prod npm run report:ai
scripts.demo:full: powershell -Command "ts-node src/run-all.ts --demo --headed; if ($LASTEXITCODE) { $true }; ts-node src/report-generator.ts --ai-analysis --demo; if ($?) { start artifacts/html-report/ai-analysis-report.html }"
scripts.prod:legacy: powershell -Command "if (Test-Path artifacts/html-report) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force artifacts/html-report }; ts-node src/run-all.ts; if ($LASTEXITCODE) { $true }; ts-node src/failure-clustering.ts --advanced; ts-node src/report-generator.ts --ai-analysis; if ($?) { start artifacts/html-report/ai-analysis-report.html }"
scripts.test-and-report: powershell -Command "npx playwright test; if ($LASTEXITCODE) { $true }; ts-node src/report-generator.ts --ai-analysis; if ($?) { start artifacts/html-report/ai-analysis-report.html }"
scripts.ci: powershell -Command "npm run prod; if ($LASTEXITCODE) { $true }; npm run notify"
